mapper.select: select count(*) from xinwentongzhi where 1=1 and biaoti like concat('%',#{biaoti,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and leibie like concat('%',#{leibie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and leibie = concat('',#{lb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and neirong like concat('%',#{neirong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shouyetupian like concat('%',#{shouyetupian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and dianjilv like concat('%',#{dianjilv,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and tianjiaren like concat('%',#{tianjiaren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select from xinwentongzhi where 1=1
and tianjiaren =#{tianjiaren}
select from xinwentongzhi where leibie='校内新闻' limit 0,8
select from xinwentongzhi where leibie='站内新闻2' limit 0,8
select from xinwentongzhi where leibie='站内新闻3' limit 0,8

biaoti, leibie, neirong, shouyetupian, dianjilv, tianjiaren,

update xinwentongzhi
